StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_MIUpdateENTNAC]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int, @EntnacSubmitDate varchar(8), @EntnacCompleteDate varchar(8), @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CONTRACT WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID) BEGIN UPDATE CONTRACT SET ENTNAC_SUBMIT_DATE = @EntnacSubmitDate, ENTNAC_COMPLETE_DATE = @EntnacCompleteDate, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID
RETURN(1) END ELSE BEGIN
UPDATE MICONTRACT SET ENTNAC_SUBMIT_DATE = @EntnacSubmitDate, ENTNAC_COMPLETE_DATE = @EntnacCompleteDate WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID
RETURN(0) END
